snippet: Four men were charged Thursday with membership in a terrorist organization and accused of planning to carry out an attack in Germany.
abstract: Four men are charged with membership in a terrorist organization and accused of planning to carry out an attack in Germany; Abdeladim el-Kebir, the group's leader, is accused of training, recruiting and indoctrinating the other three members as part of a plan by Al Qaeda.
lead_paragraph: Four men were charged Thursday with membership in a terrorist organization and accused of planning to carry out an attack in Germany.
